A regular dodecagon ($ 12$ sides) is inscribed in a circle with radius $ r$ inches.  The area of the dodecagon, in square inches, is:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 3r^2 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 2r^2 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ \frac{3r^2 \sqrt{3}}{4} \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ r^2 \sqrt{3} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 3r^2 \sqrt{3}$
